Public Remarks: Nestled in the vibrant East Oakland neighborhood, this delightful 2-bedroom, 1-bath home offers a great home for a first time home buyer or investor with approximately 1,228 sq ft of living space. Situated at 1588 76th Ave, this charming abode exudes warmth and character, perfect for those seeking a tranquil haven in a thriving community. Step inside and discover a well-maintained interior adorned with natural light that streams through ample windows. The living area seamlessly blends comfort and functionality, providing an inviting space for relaxation and entertaining. The kitchen is equipped with essential appliances and ample cabinetry, catering to the needs of any culinary enthusiast. Two well-proportioned bedrooms offer ample space for rest and relaxation, while the single bathroom is tastefully designed to accommodate daily routines. The home's exterior boasts a welcoming ambiance, with a well-kept front yard and a backyard that invites outdoor enjoyment. As a homeowner, you'll be purchasing the property As Is and you will be responsible for maintaining the sidewalk and ensuring sewer lateral compliance with the City of Oakland. This responsibility ensures the proper functioning of public infrastructure and contributes to the overall well-being of the neighborhood.
